about_the_game:
The Sparklite - Original Soundtrack features 18 tracks created by award-winning by video game composer, Dale North.

The track-listing looks like this -

  • Gear Up for Adventure
  • Abandon Ship
  • The Refuge
  • The Vinelands
  • Titan Battle
  • Titan Overcharged
  • Returning to the Refuge
  • The Goldenwoods
  • The Acid Bog
  • The Shifting Sands
  • The Founders' Vaults
  • A Hero's Fall
  • Titan's Ridge
  • The True Power of Sparklite
  • Greed Overwhelming
  • Balance Restored
  • Credits
  • Harmony's Magnum Opus
